column7: From: Church of the Flying Spaghetti Monster
column8: Actually, I look forward to the day when we can one day state in our textbooks that Mahathir is responsible for the govt we have right now.All the blatant abuse of power, govt inefficiencies, noncompetitive local industries, wide-scale corruption...all originated from him.And we need to fix this by undoing all the things Mahathir did in his term, like by striking away the amendments BN made to our constitution and restoring independence to our judiciary.And hopefully, our future generations will learn the lesson that no political party nor individual should never again be allowed to hold so much power less they abuse it.Of course, I don't expect I'll ever see it in my lifetime but maybe someday our future generations will...
